title: Motorola and Paris Hilton collab on limited edition Razr+ 2024
description: The Motorola Razr+ 2024 is getting a pink glamorous makeover with the limited edition Razr+ Paris Hilton Edition. The device comes in an exclusive Paris Pink colorway, which is similar to the regular Hot Pink colorway but with a Paris Hilton autograph on the back and "That's Hot" engraved on the phone’s hinge. The Paris Hilton Edition Razr+ comes with custom packaging, including a case and two strap options. The phone itself gets exclusive ringtones and alert sounds developed with Paris Hilton, as well as custom wallpapers. Motorola Razr+ 2024 Paris Hilton Edition Motorola...
excerpt: Available from February 13 exclusively on Motorola.com. The Motorola Razr+ 2024 is getting a pink glamorous makeover with the limited edition Razr+ Paris...
text: The Motorola Razr+ 2024 is getting a pink glamorous makeover with the limited edition Razr+ Paris Hilton Edition. The device comes in an exclusive Paris Pink colorway, which is similar to the regular Hot Pink colorway but with a Paris Hilton autograph on the back and "That's Hot" engraved on the phone’s hinge. The Paris Hilton Edition Razr+ comes with custom packaging, including a case and two strap options. The phone itself gets exclusive ringtones and alert sounds developed with Paris Hilton, as well as custom wallpapers. Motorola Razr+ 2024 Paris Hilton Edition Motorola Razr+ Paris Hilton Edition will retail for $1,200 and it will be available exclusively on Motorola.com from February 13. This will be a limited edition launch with no restocks so you’ll have to act fast if you want a unit. Motorola Razr+ 2024 Paris Hilton Edition box contents Keep in mind that Motorola is expected to announce the Razr+ 2024’s successor soon as we’ve already seen renders of the device and a Geekbench listing which confirmed it will be powered by the flagship Snapdragon 8 Gen Elite chip.
html:
The Motorola Razr+ 2024 is getting a pink glamorous makeover with the limited edition Razr+ Paris Hilton Edition. The device comes in an exclusive Paris Pink colorway, which is similar to the regular Hot Pink colorway but with a Paris Hilton autograph on the back and "That's Hot" engraved on the phone’s hinge.

The Paris Hilton Edition Razr+ comes with custom packaging, including a case and two strap options. The phone itself gets exclusive ringtones and alert sounds developed with Paris Hilton, as well as custom wallpapers.


Motorola Razr+ 2024 Paris Hilton Edition

Motorola Razr+ Paris Hilton Edition will retail for $1,200 and it will be available exclusively on Motorola.com from February 13. This will be a limited edition launch with no restocks so you’ll have to act fast if you want a unit.


Motorola Razr+ 2024 Paris Hilton Edition box contents

Keep in mind that Motorola is expected to announce the Razr+ 2024’s successor soon as we’ve already seen renders of the device and a Geekbench listing which confirmed it will be powered by the flagship Snapdragon 8 Gen Elite chip.
